messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to know how many t-shirt options are currently available in your online store. Also, I have some pending orders for small t-shirts, and I want to modify them to be purple, same size, same v-neck style, and preferably made of polyester. Could you assist me with that?

message.content: Hello! I would like to know how many t-shirt options are currently available in your online store. Also, I have some pending orders for small t-shirts, and I want to modify them to be purple, same size, same v-neck style, and preferably made of polyester. Could you assist me with that?
